content.raw:
I've already merged this but am having trouble compiling `ign-gazebo` against it

~~~
CMake Warning at /usr/share/cmake-3.10/Modules/CMakeFindDependencyMacro.cmake:48 (find_package):

  "ignition-physics1-dartsim-plugin" is considered to be NOT FOUND.  Reason
  given by package:

  The following imported targets are referenced, but are missing:
  ignition-physics1::ignition-physics1-mesh
